channel.title: Run PI on Ubuntu 10.10
channel.description:
Hi, I followed the tutorial for running a server on Ubuntu. But when I want to start my server I get the following error: [code]Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Could not create the Java virtual machine. /root/Downloads/Server/run.sh: 1: deps/poi.jar: Permission denied /root/Downloads/Server/run.sh: 1: deps/mysql.jar: Permission denied /root/Downloads/Server/run.sh: 1: deps/mina.jar: Permission denied /root/Downloads/Server/run.sh: 1: deps/slf4j.jar: Permission denied /root/Downloads/Server/run.sh: 1: deps/slf4j-nop.jar: Permission denied /root/Downloads/Server/run.sh: 1: deps/jython.jar: Permission denied /root/Downloads/Server/run.sh: 1: log4j-1.2.15.jar: not found : not foundoads/Server/run.sh: 1: server.Server : not foundoads/Server/run.sh: 2:
[/code]
And the code for run.sh: [code]java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
[/code]

item.title: Run PI on Ubuntu 10.10
item.dc:creator: @thomas27 thomas27
item.description:
@thomas27 wrote:

Hi,
I followed the tutorial for running a server on Ubuntu.
But when I want to start my server I get the following error:

[code]Error occurred during initialization of VM
Could not reserve enough space for object heap
Could not create the Java virtual machine.
/root/Downloads/Server/run.sh: 1: deps/poi.jar: Permission denied
/root/Downloads/Server/run.sh: 1: deps/mysql.jar: Permission denied
/root/Downloads/Server/run.sh: 1: deps/mina.jar: Permission denied
/root/Downloads/Server/run.sh: 1: deps/slf4j.jar: Permission denied
/root/Downloads/Server/run.sh: 1: deps/slf4j-nop.jar: Permission denied
/root/Downloads/Server/run.sh: 1: deps/jython.jar: Permission denied
/root/Downloads/Server/run.sh: 1: log4j-1.2.15.jar: not found
: not foundoads/Server/run.sh: 1: server.Server
: not foundoads/Server/run.sh: 2:

[/code]

And the code for run.sh:

[code]java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server

[/code]

Read full topic
